body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Elijah Richardson and the customer's name is Brittany Brown.  The conversation is about Phat Hogs (a Motorcycle Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Elijah Richardson, and I’m with Phat Hogs Motorcycle Dealership. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Elijah, I’m Brittany Brown. I’m looking to buy a new motorcycle.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great to meet you, Brittany! We have a fantastic selection of motorcycles. May I ask what type of bike you're interested in?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I’m considering a cruiser style, something good for long rides.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: That sounds awesome! Cruisers are perfect for comfortable long rides. Just to assist you better, could you please provide me with your zip code?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it’s two zero five zero one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that, Brittany! One more quick question, could I also have your phone number for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it’s area code three zero one, four five six, seven eight nine zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great! Thank you for that information, Brittany. We will ensure to keep you updated on the best options for you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Brittany! If you have any more questions, feel free to reach out. Have a wonderful day!
